author: Special Correspondent
text:
A court here has sentenced a youth to life imprisonment for murdering an engineering student.

According to prosecution, M. Kalidas (20), an engineering student from Parankuntrapuram under Surandai police station limits had prior enmity with P. Stalin (21) from the same area.

When Kalidas had come to his native place to attend a temple festival, Stalin stabbed him to death on September 11, 2011.

Fourth Additional Sessions Judge Gladson Blessed Tagore awarded life imprisonment to Stalin and imposed a fine of Rs. 1,000 on Friday.
title: Youth gets life term
